title: Soul Mates
description: Phillip has become obsessed with Jenny and can’t stop thinking about her. He wants to claim her as his, but the only problem is, he’s a vampire, and she’s a werewolf. Her pack aren’t willing to allow him to associate with their pack. An alliance is one thing; dating someone is another. He knows she desires him, but she doesn’t want to risk war breaking out due to a relationship between the two of them. How can he convince her that their love is more important than any alliance?
author: Julie Cannings
